About EISAZ

A century of championing Zimbabwe's engineering, iron, and steel sector through strategic partnership, policy advocacy, and member empowerment.

Our Mission
To represent and advance the interests of Zimbabwe's engineering, iron, and steel sector through strategic advocacy, member services, and partnership with government and stakeholders.
Our Vision
A globally competitive, sustainable, and innovative engineering and steel sector that drives Zimbabwe's industrial transformation and economic prosperity.

Our History

Over a century of leadership in Zimbabwe's industrial development.

1920s
Foundation of the association representing Zimbabwe's emerging steel industry
1960s
Expansion of membership base and establishment of industrial relations framework
1980s
Post-independence restructuring and alignment with national development goals
2000s
Strengthened policy advocacy and sector representation
2020s
Launch of Sector Strategy 2022-2026 aligned with NDS1

Our Values

Guiding principles that shape our work and relationships.

Excellence
Commitment to highest standards in industrial practice and member service delivery.
Collaboration
Partnership with government, unions, and stakeholders for sector growth.
Innovation
Driving modernization, technology adoption, and continuous improvement.
Integrity
Transparent governance and ethical representation of member interests.
